column98: BIG - Bjarke Ingels Group søger bogholder
column99:
Our Copenhagen office is looking for an Accountant to join our Finance department. The role as Accountant includes timely and correct booking and handling of various transactions. The Accountant must also ensure that all balance sheet accounts are reconciled monthly and follow up on differences/missing reconciliations. The Accountant will be handling tasks mainly for our Barcelona and Copenhagen offices. Some assistance to our Accounting Department in London and New York must also be expected, primarily regarding IC, accounting instructions and various projects. And since BIG is an energetic and ambitious workplace it requires a dynamic, confident, proactive and organized individual and team player to keep up with a fast-paced and changeable environment. The team in Copenhagen consists of 7 people handling everything within the area of Finance from payroll and bookkeeping to expenses and tax. The accountant is reporting to the CFO based in CPH. Primary Responsibilities: 
 
 Processing invoices in Rillion 
 Bookkeeping in Navision 
 DK VAT reporting 
 Processing expense report in SAP Concur 
 Process outgoing payments 
 Manage and handle I/C reconciliation and transactions 
 Monthly reporting, assisting the Finance Manager to finalize analysis and figures 
 Ensure all balance sheet accounts are reconciled monthly and follow up on reconciliation items. 
 Assist at audits 
 Supporting the Finance manager with various tasks 
 
 The Ideal candidate: 
 
 Solid accounting and excel knowledge 
 Relevant work experience in similar role, minimum 2 years 
 Relevant financial education of 2 years is minimum 
 Previous experience from an international organization is a plus 
 Previous experience with Navision, SAP Concur or Rillion is a plus 
 Responsible, self-driven and independent 
 Handle simultaneous deadlines and tasks 
 Must work systematic and structured 
 Enjoys a busy and creative environment with many personalities 
 Is comfortable with fast-paced decisions and rapidly changing environments 
 Professional proficiency in Danish and English, spoken and written 
 
 BIG offers: 
 
 A professional, committed and social environment with many social events 
 A diverse group of architects, technologists, engineers and specialists with more than 45 different nationalities 
 Great variety of company discounts 
 Salary and pension scheme based on experience and qualifications 
 Future development and career opportunities 
 Flexible lunch options 
 Possibility for further education 
 
 Application: Please apply using the "Send Application"-button. We are excited to welcome our new colleague to our team, so we are looking to fill this position soonest. Interviews are conducted on an ongoing basis. The job add will be taken down as soon as the right candidate has been found.
